actions.text: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. de la Garza.
On agreeing to the de la Garza amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides that funds authorized for grants to States to build sewage treatment facilities for colonias may also be used for appropriate connections to treatment plants; and eliminates language setting a specific Federal share of the cost of these projects.
purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 63 in the Congressional Record of May 11)
